summary: Compatibility Patches for latest version of requiem with RDO and various mod combinations while using RDO.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

Some quick compatibility patches I made using TES5Edit to make Requiem 2.0 work smoothly with Relationship Dialogue Overhaul and other similar mods.

[b][u]Load Orders[/u][/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]RDO[/url]:

----Requiem.esp
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - RDO Patch.esp[/color]



[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390]GDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]RDO[/url]:

----Requiem.esp
----Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - GDO_RDO Patch.esp[/color]


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390]GDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]RDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52283]Serana Dialogue Edit[/url]:


----Requiem.esp
----Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - GDO_RDO Patch.esp[/color]
----Serana Dialogue Edit.esp



[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390]GDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]RDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52283]Serana Dialogue Edit[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933]EFF[/url]:

----EFFCore.esm
----Requiem.esp
----Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - GDO_RDO Patch.esp[/color]
----Serana Dialogue Edit.esp
----EFF Dialogue.esp
----RDO - EFF v4.0.2 Patch.esp


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]USLEEP[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327]CRF[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390]GDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]RDO[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52283]Serana Dialogue Edit[/url]:

----Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp
----Cutting Room Floor.esp
----Requiem.esp
----Requiem - Legendary Bugmasher Edition.esp
----Requiem - Cutting Room Floor.esp
----Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----RDO - Cutting Room Floor Patch.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - CRF_GDO_RDO Patch.esp[/color]
----Serana Dialogue Edit.esp


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url] + [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71689]iAFT[/url] + Any of the Above Combination:

----Requiem.esp
----AmazingFollowerTweaks.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - iAFT Patch.esp[/color]
----Relationship Dialogue Overhaul.esp
----[color=#00ff00]Requiem - RDO Patch.esp[/color]
-----<<Follow Same pattern>>

[b][u]FAQ[/u][/b]

Q: Could you make a patch for xx mod with requiem?
A: It depends, if xx mod is causing cross conflicts when using with both Requiem and RDO then I might otherwise chances are slim. You could still ask in comments section though.

Q: Do I need a new game for this?
A: You shouldn't unless you are updating from Requiem 1.9.4.

Q: I am encountering bugs/problems.
A: I do test a few aspects of patch but I can't test everything so if encounter some bugs or you feel like something is broken do tell me in comments section.
author: DarkShenron
